data.expected_result: The textbox would appear on the inside of the panel like other textboxes do (see attachments)
data.short_description: [OVERLAY] Little black "SETTINGS" textbox when hovering over the settings icon will go offscreen if placed along the top
data.steps_to_repro: - open up overlay in a game and shove the panel to the top (top left corner works) - hover over the settings icon at the top
